bestsellers.author: H. D. Carlton
bestsellers.description: I can manipulate the emotions of anyone who lets me. I will make you hurt, make you cry, make you laugh and sigh. But my words don't affect him. Especially not when I plead for him to leave. He's always there, watching and waiting. And I can never look away. Not when I want him closer....
bestsellers.title: Haunting Adeline

bestsellers.author: Kaylie Smith
bestsellers.description: Welcome to Enchantra. There’s only one rule: Never, ever trust your heart.
bestsellers.series: A Spicy Fantasy Romance (Wicked Games, Book 2)
bestsellers.title: Enchantra

bestsellers.author: Kaylie Smith
bestsellers.description: There are only two rules to the game. Stay alive. And don’t fall in love. When Ophelia’s sister disappears, there is only one way to save her. Ophelia must enter Phantasma, a deadly contest inside a haunted mansion, and claim its prize—a single wish.
bestsellers.series: A dark fantasy romance (Wicked Games Book 1)
bestsellers.title: Phantasma

bestsellers.author: Shantel Tessier
bestsellers.description: I was raised in a world where money and power are at your fingertips. My father is a lord, a very respected member of a secret society that knows no bounds. When tragedy struck my family, we discovered we weren’t untouchable....
bestsellers.title: The Sinner

bestsellers.author: Penelope Douglas
bestsellers.description: Three of them, one of her, and a remote cabin in the woods. Let the hot winter nights ensue....
bestsellers.narrated_by: Sofia Willingham, Greg Tremblay, Carson Beck, and others
bestsellers.title: Credence

bestsellers.author: Leigh Rivers
bestsellers.description: She betrayed him, and now he wants revenge against the sister who became his forbidden obsession the second he laid eyes on her. After she sends him to prison for years, he’s free and ready to haunt her.
bestsellers.title: Little Stranger

bestsellers.author: CJ Sweet
bestsellers.description: He’s waited a long time for me, but I’ve waited longer for the truth. Not even the king himself could keep me from the only ties left to my identity. Then I meet him, and I’m stuck between uncovering who I am and discovering who I’m meant to be.
bestsellers.title: Come for Me

bestsellers.author: Shantel Tessier
bestsellers.description: A Lord takes what he wants. But like anything else, even he can get greedy and betray his oath.
bestsellers.title: Madness

bestsellers.author: C.J. Sweet
bestsellers.description: He’s waited a long time for me, but I’ve waited longer for the truth. Not even the king himself could keep me from the only ties left to my identity. Then I meet him, and I’m stuck between uncovering who I am and discovering who I’m meant to be.
bestsellers.title: Come for Me

bestsellers.author: Shantel Tessier
bestsellers.description: Raylee Lexington Adams is my stepsister and the one woman in the world who can make my blood boil. She’s vindictive, a lot of crazy, and absolutely stunning. I hate everything about her except for when she’s on her knees begging me to use her as my own personal toy.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Gabriel Spires, Celia Stone, Gregory Salinas
bestsellers.series: A Dark Enemies to Lovers Romance
bestsellers.title: Sabotage

bestsellers.author: Leigh Rivers
bestsellers.description: Malachi Vize has always had one desire in life. One goal. One deep obsession he could never give up on. His foster sister Olivia.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Heather Firth, Grayson Owens, Shane East, and others
bestsellers.series: A Dark Taboo Romance (The Web of Silence Duet, Book 2)
bestsellers.title: Little Liar

bestsellers.author: Harley LaRoux
bestsellers.description: I earned my reputation among magicians for a reason: one wrong move and you're dead. Killer, they called me, and killing is what I'm best at. Except her. The one I was supposed to take, the one I should have killed–I didn't....
bestsellers.title: Her Soul to Take

bestsellers.author: Paisley Hope
bestsellers.description: Gabriel Wolfe, the fallen dark angel and club president of the Hounds of Hell MC. His life has been infused with darkness and trauma since the day he was born, forcing more than just desensitization to violence and chaos. Forcing him to crave it to feel stable. Secure. Whole.
bestsellers.title: Wolf.e

bestsellers.author: Jescie Hall
bestsellers.description: From author Jescie Hall comes this dark and demanding stalker romance that pushes all the boundaries of exploring sexuality while simultaneously exposing the harsh realities of organized religion....
bestsellers.title: That Sik Luv

bestsellers.author: Gigi Styx
bestsellers.description: I'm trapped in a forgotten nightmare with the monster I most fear. The key to my freedom lies behind a wall of memories. Xero's specter invades my mind, whispering both vengeance and salvation. He insists he's real, yet I can't trust my shattered psyche.
bestsellers.title: I Will Mend You

bestsellers.author: Katelyn Taylor
bestsellers.description: My heart is broken, my pride shattered to pieces on that altar. He walked away so easily, too easily, and I know none of us will ever forgive him. We have bigger issues to focus on, though, here in Salem.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Amy Hall, Devon Ryder, Edward Black, and others
bestsellers.title: Descent

bestsellers.author: Penelope Douglas
bestsellers.description: I never minded being locked up. I learned a long time ago that being treated like an animal gives you permission to act like one. Their only mistake is believing anything I do is an accident....
bestsellers.title: Nightfall

bestsellers.author: Sara Cate
bestsellers.description: I’m a voyeur—it means I like to watch. And in my line of work, that’s a gift. As one of the four owners of the Salacious Players’ Club, I’m comfortable on the sidelines. This is what I was made to do, and I work better alone. Until the day I stumble on a certain cam girl app....
bestsellers.title: Eyes on Me

bestsellers.author: Sadie Kincaid
bestsellers.description: West Archer, Ezekiel Cavanagh, and Xander King. AKA The Unholy Trinity. Ruthless. Ambitious. Intimidating. With dark tastes and even darker desires, they've been searching for the perfect woman to fit into their unique lifestyle for over a decade.
bestsellers.narrated_by: Maxine Mitchell, Aaron Shedlock, Grayson Owens, and others
bestsellers.title: The Perfect Fit

bestsellers.author: Elliott Rose
bestsellers.description: In this steamy, age-gap, forbidden-love cowboy romance for fans of Lyla Sage, Bailey Hannah, and Elsie Silver, a free spirit finds herself working for a former pro bull rider...who has secrets behind those ocean-deep eyes.
bestsellers.title: Taming the Heart

bestsellers.author: H. D. Carlton
bestsellers.description: The married woman of the manor. The stranger outside. An intoxicating novel of dark temptation and dangerous desire by the New York Times and USA Today bestselling author of the Cat and Mouse Duet.
bestsellers.title: Phantom

bestsellers.author: S.T. Abby
bestsellers.description: Hush, little baby, don't say a word . . . Will Logan choose them? Or will we watch them burn together? It's time to f--k with their minds. It's time to finish it all. It's time to paint it all red . . . Monsters don't usually wish for happily-ever-afters....
bestsellers.title: Paint It All Red

bestsellers.author: Becka Mack
bestsellers.description: It was supposed to be a one-night stand. But what if they can't leave it in the past?
bestsellers.title: Fall with Me

bestsellers.author: S.T. Abby
bestsellers.description: To kill a monster, you have to be twice as monstrous. To love a monster, you have to share your soul....
bestsellers.title: Scarlet Angel

bestsellers.author: Elliott Rose
bestsellers.description: What happens when you're snowed in on a mountain ranch with the one man you definitely should not be fantasizing about?
bestsellers.title: Chasing the Wild

bestsellers.author: Katelyn Taylor
bestsellers.description: I thought I had everything I could possibly desire. Until I set my eyes on her. My angel. Too pure for this world, too pure for me. She’s all mine. No matter the cost. No matter the lives that stand in my way. She has always been mine. She just doesn’t know it yet.
bestsellers.title: Graves

bestsellers.author: Sara Cate
bestsellers.description: I’m a scoundrel. Playboy. Basically, I get around, and I’m not afraid to admit it. So when my best friend opens up Salacious Players’ Club and asks me to head the construction, how could I say no? Now we’re on a cross-country road trip touring other kink clubs....
bestsellers.narrated_by: Allie Martina, Aaron Shedlock, Tim Paige
bestsellers.title: Give Me More

bestsellers.author: Jescie Hall
bestsellers.description: From Amazon bestselling author Jescie Hall comes a new dark college romance about one man's online obsession with his new stepsister.
bestsellers.title: Green Light
